mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT.NAME , PAYMENT.PER_TIME , PAYMENT.BUYER_NAME FROM PAY_IMPORT PAYMENT WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PAYMENT.PER_TIME DESC

SELECT NAME, PER_TIME, PER_NUM, BUYER_NAME from( SELECT ROWNUM rn, PAYMENT.NAME, PAYMENT.BUYER_NAME, PAYMENT.PER_TIME, PAYMENT.PER_NUM FROM PAY_IMPORT PAYMENT WHERE
name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
buyer_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
PAYMENT.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_CD = 'R' AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY PAYMENT.PER_TIME DESC ) where RN > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

/* retrieveBoard */ SELECT PAYMENT.PER_NUM , PAYMENT.NAME , PAYMENT.PER_TIME , PAYMENT.BUYER_NAME , PAYMENT.BUYER_TEL , PAYMENT.BUYER_EMAIL , PAYMENT.BUYER_POSTCODE , PAYMENT.BUYER_ADDR FROM PAY_IMPORT PAYMENT WHERE 1=1 AND PER_NUM = #{per_num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_IMPORT WHERE
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_CD = 'R'
